column2: Don't forget the cardinal fucking rule: "Buy the fear  sell the greed" @WolfOfPoloniex $neo $ltc $btc $eth
The cryptocurrency world took a hit but still going to hold #ripple #btc
A few reminders:  BTC is stronger than ever (consider price 3-6 months ago)  Ether was an ico.  Speculators are not long term friends.
Learn about the difference between #Blockchain and #bitcoin in this blog post by @mqmatt https://t.co/oCuMD9HSzI https://t.co/zg2dIkEx03
